    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RGPlayer()

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayers

        static RGPlayer getPlayers()
        This method is used to assure only one instance (only one set of players) is created
        Returns:
        Set of players.

      • validateNumberOfPLayers

        boolean validateNumberOfPLayers​(java.lang.String players)
        This method is used to validate the number of players registered by the user. Must be between 2 and 6.
        Parameters:
        players - String with the names of players separated by commas.
        Returns:
        'true' if number of players between 2 and 6; otherwise 'false'.

      • setPlayers

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> setPlayers​(java.lang.String players)
        This method is used to create the player's data structure: 1) Players' Data Structure: It is a HashMap data structure that contains all the information associated to each player. The key value is the name of the player (String), and the value of the key is an ArrayList (String) that contains all the information of the player: Turn, color, and number of armies for Setup Phase.
        Parameters:
        players - String with the names of players separated by commas.
        Returns:
        List with the name of the players created.

      • getPlayerColor

        java.lang.String getPlayerColor​(java.lang.String vertex)
        This method returns the color of a player.
        Parameters:
        vertex - Name of the player.
        Returns:
        Color of a player.

      • allocateArmies

        void allocateArmies​(RGGame game)
        This method is used to set the number of armies for a player in the Setup Phase.
        Parameters:
        game - object with the information of the current game.

      • initializeCards

        void initializeCards()
        This method is used to allocate zero cards for every player for the Attack Phase

      • initializeArmiesForReinforcementPhase

        void initializeArmiesForReinforcementPhase()
        This method is used to allocate zero armies for every player for the Reinforcement Phase

      • initializePerformedActionsForEachPhase

        void initializePerformedActionsForEachPhase()
        This method is used to create positions 7, 8, 9, 10 in players' data structure to store the actions performed by players during play time

      • getPlayerTurn

        java.lang.String getPlayerTurn()
        This method is used to get the current turn in the game.
        Returns:
        Name of the player with the current turn.

      • getCurrentArmies

        java.lang.String getCurrentArmies​(java.lang.String vertex)
        This method is used to get the current armies a player can place on his/her countries.
        Parameters:
        vertex - Name of the player.
        Returns:
        Number of armies available for a given player.

      • setNumberOfArmiesSetup

        void setNumberOfArmiesSetup​(int numberOfArmiesToAdd,
                            java.lang.String vertex)
        This method is used to subtract one army of the value 'number of armies for Setup Phase' of the players' data structure for a given player.
        Parameters:
        numberOfArmiesToAdd - Number of armies to subtract in this case.
        vertex - Name of the player.

      • setNextTurn

        void setNextTurn()
        This method is used to set the next player's turn.

      • getSumArmiesSetup

        int getSumArmiesSetup()
        This method is used to get the total of armies (of all players) to place in the Setup Phase. This is used to know when the Setup Phase is finished.
        Returns:
        Total of armies (of all players) available to place.

      • initializeTurn

        void initializeTurn()
        This method is used to set the first turn once the Setup Phase is finished.

      • getNumberOfArmiesForReinforcement

        java.lang.String getNumberOfArmiesForReinforcement​(java.lang.String currentPlayerName)
        This method is used to get the total of armies for Reinforcement Phase stored in position 6 of Players' data structure.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayerName - Name of the player.
        Returns:
        Total of armies for Reinforcement Phase

      • setNumberOfArmiesForReinforcement

        void setNumberOfArmiesForReinforcement​(java.lang.String currentPlayerName)
        This method is used to set the total of armies for Reinforcement Phase given a player.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayerName - Name of the player.

      • subtractArmiesForReinforcementPhase

        void subtractArmiesForReinforcementPhase​(java.lang.String currentPlayerName,
                                         java.lang.String armiesToPlace)
        This method is used to subtract the number of armies just placed in a country from the total number of armies available to place.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayerName - Name of the player.
        armiesToPlace - Number of armies to place.

      • setActionsPerformed

        void setActionsPerformed​(java.lang.StringBuilder actionPerformed,
                         java.lang.String currentPlayerName,
                         java.lang.String phase)
        This method is used to store the actions performed during play time in the players' data structure for Attack Phase given a player name.
        Parameters:
        actionPerformed - List of action performed in Attack Phase.
        currentPlayerName - Name of the player.
        phase - Current phase.

      • getActionsPerformed

        java.lang.String getActionsPerformed​(java.lang.String currentPlayerName,
                                     java.lang.String phase)
        This method is used to obtain the list of actions performed by any user in AttackPhase.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayerName - Name of the player.
        phase - Current phase.
        Returns:
        List of actions.

      • initializeCardUsedCount

        void initializeCardUsedCount()
        This method is used to create position 11 in players' data structure to store the number of times the cards are used by the player

      • setNumberOfArmiesForUsedCard

        int setNumberOfArmiesForUsedCard​(java.lang.String currentPlayerName,
                                 int army)
        This method is used to set the total of armies after use of cards for a given player.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayerName - Name of the player.
        army - number of army received from reinforcement phase.
        Returns:
        New number of armies after exchanging cards.

      • deletePlayer

        void deletePlayer​(java.lang.String loserPlayerName)
        This method is used to delete a player when he/she does not own more territories.
        Parameters:
        loserPlayerName - Name of the loser.
